name: Left Levator Scapulae Stretch
how_to_perform:
1. Stand in a doorway with your hands on the doorframe at shoulder height.

2. Step forward with your right foot and raise your left arm until it's parallel to the floor.

3. Gently lean away from the door, stretching the muscles on both sides of your throat.

4. Hold for 15-30 seconds and repeat 3-4 times on each side.

5. Come back to the starting position and switch sides.
short_summary: Stretch the left levator scapulae muscle with this simple exercise.
